member.name: M:Netco.ActionPolicyServices.ExceptionHandlerSyntaxAsync.CircuitBreaker(Netco.Syntaxis.SyntaxAsync{Netco.ActionPolicyServices.ExceptionHandler},System.TimeSpan,System.Int32)

summary.para: Builds the policy that will "break the circuit" after exceptions that could be handled by the being built. The circuit stays broken for the . Any attempt to invoke method within the policy, while the circuit is broken, will immediately re-throw the last exception.
If the action fails within the policy after the block period, then the breaker is blocked again for the next . It will be reset, otherwise.

member.param: How much time the breaker will stay open before resetting
How many exceptions are needed to break the circuit
member.remarks: (see "ReleaseIT!" for the details)
